projects.name: BookSphere (Individual)
projects.description: Developed a responsive web application for browsing, purchasing, and managing books. Features include genre-based book browsing, detailed book views, cart management, checkout process, order summary, order confirmation, and profile viewing.

projects.name: Flower Paradise (Individual) (Ongoing)
projects.description: Built a custom flower bouquet ordering website with an intuitive frontend for a seamless shopping experience and a robust admin panel for efficient inventory and order management.

projects.name: PinkPearl (Group)
projects.description: Collaboratively built a full-stack website for a women's fashion boutique, including product catalogs, user account management, order processing, and an admin panel for efficient management.

projects.name: Notes App (Individual)
projects.description: Developed a dynamic notes app for adding, editing, deleting, and searching notes, ensuring a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Phone Store (Individual)
projects.description: Created a phone website project, which included the development of different user roles such as User, Admin, and Superadmin, each with specific capabilities.
